name: Dad's Banana Nut Bread
author: tjmallick
summary: My dad made this bread for years to the delight to our family. Pair it with a dish of fruit and a cup of coffee for breakfast. Yum! The flax seed meal gives a great texture without altering the flavor.
directions: Preheat an oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan, or line a muffin pan with cupcake liners
In a mixing bowl, beat the butter and sugar with an electric mixer until light and fluffy
Beat in the eggs one at a time, followed by the bananas
Mix in the self-rising flour and flax seed meal until just incorporated; fold in the walnuts
Pour batter into the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 20 minutes for muffins, or 1 hour for a loaf
Cool in the pan for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
